name: deviofoundation.org
description: Ways of thinking, a single goal!
author: CJ Patoilo <cjpatoilo@gmail.com>

scripts.build: rimraf dist && marshmallow -o dist -i artwork.psd -t 'DEV IO Foundation' -d 'Ways of thinking, a single goal!' -f -m && inject-ga dist/index.html -o dist/index.html -c 'UA-24389952-19'
scripts.deploy:staging: NODE_ENV=staging npm run build && surge -p dist -d staging.deviofoundation.org
scripts.deploy:production: NODE_ENV=production npm run build && cname dist && boeing dist
scripts.test: nyc ava && eslint . -c styled --ignore-path .gitignore && editorconfig-tools check .
